Actions.Name: Chant of Investiture
Actions.Description: An ally in range 8 is marked by the Cantrix. While in this stance, the Cantrix is immobile and must spend 1 action during their turn to maintain this stance. It ends if the Cantrix is shoved or stunned.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they gain resistance, sturdy, and +1 boon on all attacks and saves while in range 8 of the Cantrix.

Actions.Name: Hypnogogia
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 of the Cantrix becomes pacified. If already pacified, the character becomes unable to dash until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Escape
Actions.Description: The Cantrix swaps places with a marked ally.
